title: Varan
occurrences: Anti-Varan Headquarters have been set up by the Ministry of Defense.
So, up to this very moment, there is nothing we can fight Varan with.
We have ample evidence to assume that Varan is a Varanopode...
But one thing we are sure is that we shall never let Varan enter the cities.
Varan destroyed the Iwaya Village and returned all the way out here.
They will lure Varan out.
Where is Varan right now?
Oh, I suppose, Varan is at the bottom of the lake.
Ah, it's Varan!
Varan! It's Varan.
You just saw what happened. Varan is indestructible.
To kill Varan, we might have to use something really drastic.
Varan suddenly emerged in the area called the Tibet of Japan.
Despite the attack by the Self-Defense Force, Varan disappeared into the sky.
And now, Varan is approaching Tokyo after it evaded...
Can we let Varan destroy Tokyo?
Varan is approaching.
Varan is approaching.
Your attention, Please! Varan is approaching.
Unless we can detonate it inside of Varan, it's quite useless.
Varan is approaching the Air field.
Kusama, this is the showdown between Varan and us.
Varan has passed the Haneda light-house.
No, if we shock Varan too much, it will also anger him.
We'll attack Varan from the inside.
There is one more bomb inside Varan.
Thus, Varan has vanished into a veil of mystery.
